remarks: Variation on ~ lgsdi valid for all ` M , N ` but only for positive ` A ` .  (The exact location of the failure of this law is for ` A = -u 1 ` , ` M = 0 ` , and some ` N ` in which case ` ( -u 1 /L 0 ) = 1 ` but ` ( -u 1 /L N ) = -u 1 ` when ` -u 1 ` is not a quadratic residue mod ` N ` .)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2016.)
statement: lgsdinn0 $p |- ( ( A e. NN0 /\ M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ ) -> ( A /L ( M x. N ) ) = ( ( A /L M ) x. ( A /L N ) ) ) $.
